articles.title: Don't let anyone tell you you're not skilled enough to enjoy Ninja Gaiden 4 - I'm near-incompetent yet having an absolute blast with Xbox's hack 'n' slash - Eurogamer
articles.description: Ninja Gaiden 4 is hard, but don't let that put you off from playing it.

articles.title: Claude Code comes to iOS and web as research preview - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Today, Anthropic rolled out Claude Code on the web and iOS, launching it as a research preview to subscribers on its Pro and Max plans.

articles.title: Apple will let users roll back the Liquid Glass look with new ‘tinted’ option - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is responding to user feedback on its new Liquid Glass design with a setting that lets users choose between Clear and Tinted appearances. Introduced in iOS 26.1 beta 4, the option gives users more control over interface opacity after complaints that Liq…

articles.title: Apple Watch Ultra 3 after one month: The feature I can’t give up - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple Watch Ultra 3 after one month: Here’s what my experience has been like as someone new to the Ultra line.

articles.title: Google reportedly searching for 15 Pixel “Superfans” to test unreleased phones - Ars Technica
articles.description: Selected testers will have to sign an NDA and use a disguised case.
